blocks.content:
## I am Ogunlade Olatokunbo

I used to be a stay-at-home mum that was clueless about her career path.

 Out of curiosity,i decided to learn computer programming and today , I am a software Engineer. 

 This ia a story of grit,courage,failures and many sucesses.

 I hope these stories inspires you to do the amazing!

hero.headline: Welcome to The Coding Mum.
hero.textline: A mother's journey to becoming a Software Developer.
